body:
Comment 19: 
yes, but the toolchain uses much more libc symbols than cmd/go does, and as
Ian mentioned, if the toolchain uses memcpy (which it does), it might depend
on a very recent version of that symbol.

CL 13887043 not only address this part of the issue, it mainly address
issue #6448 where it's not very practical to release every binary package
for two ARM FP ABI.
